title: [娱乐|机械|角色|整地][未汉化]Craftz B17 —— 大更新!背包来袭![1.8/1.8.1]
author: Forever.Tower
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Forever.Tower 于 2017-9-28 20:10 编辑 

只是看到zhang624232848的帖子没有更新了，所以才去官网看了一下，发现有了更新介绍。插件介绍戳我.个人觉得本次更新比较大的亮点就是支持1.8和背包了←明明B15就支持1.8了好么

更新如下
汉化:? 增加了: 背包
背包是用箱子的形式打开? They are physical items (displayed as chests).
可以在kit和已经设置好的物资箱里获得一个背包
用 /craftz makebackpack <大小> <名字> 示范: /craftz makebackpack <9> <随身背包> 创建一个名为"随身背包"的9格子的背包                                                如果想加入物资箱刷新: <backpack:这里填写大小:这里写名字>
添加：可以在新的配置文件中你可以自定义敌人的类型。所有以前的僵尸只能设置单独的属性。
改变：敌人的血量现在可以大于Vanilla的最大? Changed: Enemy health can now be higher than the Vanilla maximum.? 更改：可以在配置文件里设置采集木头的限制?Changed: The log harvesting limit can be configured.
改变：改进的树检测算法。
改变：大堂重置可以在配置文件里关掉
添加：当有箱子被推的时候(活塞推?)里面的东西会掉落? Added: Loot chests drop contents when punched.
修正:  箱子会多刷新一个物品的BUG
修正：当没有玩家在线的时候会自动刷新僵尸
修正：篝火不再会做饭
修正：当非游戏人的目标是一个实体?Fixed: Exception when non-playing person was targeted by an entity.
修正：装甲架会生成溅血粒子效果?Fixed: Armor stands create blood particles.
修正：僵尸有时会让玩家着火(说好僵尸可以设置不着火的呢- -)
改变：在阳光下燃烧的僵尸可以启用
改变：可配置出血和中毒间隔时间
改变：能见度可以禁止使用，掉落的经验可以启用?Changed: The visibility bar can be disabled and EXP drops can be enabled.
改变：两种不同的包扎消息(当你流血的时候/不流血的时候)

下面是英文版
B17Added: Backpacks
They are physical items (displayed as chests).Can be obtained in kits or loot chests.Create with '/craftz makebackpack <size> <name>'.Add to loot lists in the form of '<backpack:18:British Assault Pack>'.
Added: Enemy types can be defined in a new configuration file. All previously zombie-only properties can be set individually.Changed: Enemy health can now be higher than the Vanilla maximum.Changed: The log harvesting limit can be configured.Changed: The tree detection algorithm was improved.Changed: The lobby reset can be disabled.Added: Loot chests drop contents when punched.Fixed: Loot chests refill 1 more item than they should.Fixed: Auto zombie spawns queuing up when no player is online.Fixed: Campfires don't cook food.Fixed: Exception when non-playing person was targeted by an entity.Fixed: Armor stands create blood particles.Fixed: Zombies sometimes setting players on fire.Changed: Zombies burning in sunlight can be enabled.Changed: Bleeding and poisoning damage intervals can be configured.Changed: The visibility bar can be disabled and EXP drops can be enabled.Changed: Different bandaging message when not bleeding.
